SHLCI case definition is as follows:
•
Anyone presenting with ILI that requires hospital admission because of pneumonia, acute respiratory distress, multi-organic impairment, septic shock, ICU admission or
•
Anyone who develops the latter symptoms during their hospital stay having being admitted to the hospital for any reason other than influenza or
•
Anyone with confirmed influenza infection who dies during their hospital stay. 7, 8
